verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H8104>Keep<s%> ye <S%H4941>justice<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; for my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>, and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to be <S%H1540>revealed<s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H1121>this<s%>, and the son of <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H2388>holdeth<s%> it <S%H8104>fast<s%>; that keepeth the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> from <S%H2490>profaning<s%> <S%H8104>it<s%>, and keepeth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H6213>doing<s%> any <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Neither let <S%H1121>the<s%> <S%H5236>foreigner<s%>, that hath <S%H3867>joined<s%> himself to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>speak<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H914>surely<s%> <S%H914>separate<s%> me from his <S%H5971>people<s%>; neither let the <S%H5631>eunuch<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3002>Behold<s%>, I am a dry <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> that <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and <S%H977>choose<s%> the things that <S%H2654>please<s%> <S%H2388>me<s%>, and hold fast my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>:

Unto them will I <S%H5414>give<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and within my <S%H2346>walls<s%> a <S%H3027>memorial<s%> and a <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, that shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

Also <S%H1121>the<s%> <S%H5236>foreigners<s%> that <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H157>him<s%>, and to love the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to be his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, every one that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> from <S%H2490>profaning<s%> <S%H2388>it<s%>, and holdeth fast my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>;

even them will I <S%H935>bring<s%> to my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and make them <S%H8055>joyful<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer<s%>: their <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> and their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> upon mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>; for my <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, who <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%>, Yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> others to <S%H6908>him<s%>, besides his own that are gathered.
All ye <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%>, <S%H2416>yea<s%>, all ye beasts in the <S%H3293>forest<s%>.

His <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> are <S%H5787>blind<s%>, they are all without <S%H3045>knowledge<s%>; they are all <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H3611>dogs<s%>, they <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5024>bark<s%>; <S%H1957>dreaming<s%>, lying <S%H7901>down<s%>, <S%H157>loving<s%> to <S%H5123>slumber<s%>.

Yea <S%H3611><s%>, the dogs are <S%H5794>greedy<s%>, they <S%H3045>can<s%> never <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H7654>enough<s%>; and these are <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> that cannot <S%H995>understand<s%>: they have all <S%H6437>turned<s%> to their own <S%H1870>way<s%>, each <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H1215>gain<s%>, from every <S%H7097>quarter<s%>.

Come <S%H857><s%> <S%H3947>ye<s%>, say they, I will fetch <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and we will <S%H5433>fill<s%> ourselves with strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; and <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> shall be as this <S%H4279>day<s%>, a day <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H3499>beyond<s%> <S%H1419>measure<s%>.
